summary: Need a greater challenge? Ever tried to go through the game with ONLY vanilla equipment?
descriptionHtml:
Need a greater challenge? Ever tried to go through the game with ONLY vanilla equipment?

Disabled Crafting - Workstation Only: Removes the ability to craft items using workstations.

Q: What does this mod do?

A: Many times I have read how \"Skyrim isn\'t hard enough\" or \"Legendary?!? Woop-de-do....\"
   Now, with this mod installed, you must face the hardships of Skyrim with only the items
   you find or buy.

Q: Why would you make a mod like this?

A: For the same reason someone would use a mod that disables fast travel, temptation
   removal.  (The temptation to create \"cheat\" quality equipment that is.)

Q: How does this mod work?

A: When you go up to any workstation in the game and activate it, it will only play the
   animation.  No menus or lists should pop-up.  This is accomplished without scripts, and
   will not mess with your saves should you choose to uninstall.

Q: How do I install/uninstall?

A: It\'s a single .esp file.  You know what to do.....
author: gimpyparrot
